Reason: The 'commitlog_sync' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the type of CommitLog service used in the system, which in turn impacts the performance and durability of write operations. The choice of 'commitlog_sync' option can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
